com.epoch.assgts
Class HWQGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.assgts.HWQGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
HWDescrConstants
public class HWQGroup
extends Object
implements HWDescrConstants

Contains a group of questions within an assignment as it is being created by an instructor. The questions are grouped into bundles of bundleSize questions; when an assignment is created, ACE randomly chooses pick bundles.

Field Summary
private  int bundleSize
          The size of each bundle of questions to pick from this group.
private  int pick
          How many bundles of questions to pick from this group.
private  List<Question> questions
          The questions in this group.
